content:

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section:
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation:

Summary:

Comment: Is this the R1 content or not? According to this page it is the DRAFT of the R1 content.

Existing wording: This is the draft of the 1.0 release of the FHIRcast specification.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section:
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation:

Summary:

Comment: Is this the R1 content or not? According to this page it is the DRAFT of the R1 content.

Existing wording: This is the draft of the 1.0 release of the FHIRcast specification.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #174

Hi Tony,

This is the draft of a published 1.0 version of the specification. The term R1 doesn't exist in the webpages. It's a draft because there may be changes to it during the ballot process.

Without proposed wording, I'm considering that this is a Question answered. Any concerns?

Isaac

ajuliansr commented on Issue #174

When providing ballot content we generally don't specify it is draft: the community SHOULD understand that it is draft until it is published. R1 is an HL7 term for the first release of a specification.

isaacvetter commented on Issue #174

Proposed resolution: Persuasive.

Will remove the term "draft" from the specification following publication.

NiklasSvenzen labeled Issue #174

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section:
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation:

Summary:

Comment: Is this the R1 content or not? According to this page it is the DRAFT of the R1 content.

Existing wording: This is the draft of the 1.0 release of the FHIRcast specification.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #174

The balloted versions get the major numbers (STU1, STU2 and then an R3 if normative).

"1.0 Draft" This is the draft of the 1.0 release of the FHIRcast specification. We are currently working towards a 1.0 release and would love your feedback and proposed changes. Look at our current issue list and get involved!

Disposition: Persuasive
Will change the term from Draft 1.0 to STU1 in the specification following publication.

wmaethner commented on Issue #174

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Isaac Vetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Niklas Svenzen

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will change the term from Draft 1.0 to STU1 in the specification following publication.

:+1: For: 7
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

wmaethner labeled Issue #174
